body:
No luck with Photoshop lens corrections. This is like poor freehand drawing. All gridlines are not vertical or horizontal, but warped in interesting ways. 


Each square with barrel distortion has to be corrected individually. Greg needs to do take care of this right now :) This community needs a tool to shift pixels in a Radiance image around. Input could be a black and white grid image showing the barrel distortion. Output would be the image with straight lines. 


Greg, I can help you with the command line :) :


pcomb -f barrel.cal barrelgrid.pic original.hdr > corrected.hdr


See, Greg, we are already halfway there :)


Martin
